ancestry.name: Sprite

features.name: Low-Light Vision
entries: You can see in dim light as though it were bright light, and you ignore the {@condition concealed} condition due to dim light.

features.name: Magical Strikes
entries: Your inherent magic pervades your entire being. All your {@action Strike||Strikes} are magical, whether with unarmed attacks or weapons.
Sprites are diminutive, whimsical, and exuberant creatures from the fey realm known as the First World. They love playing pranks, exploring new things, and embracing everything to do with magic.

heritage.name: Draxie
entries: You are kin to faerie dragons, tracing your heritage back to the death of the mightiest faerie dragon in the First World. You gain touch {@ability telepathy}, allowing you to communicate silently and purely mentally with any creature you're touching, as long as you share a language.

heritage.name: Grig
entries: You have the hindquarters of a cricket and adore art and music. Your cricket legs grant you a +2 circumstance bonus on {@skill Athletics} checks to {@action High Jump|CRB} or {@action Long Jump|CRB}, and you gain {@spell ghost sound|CRB} as a primal innate cantrip.

heritage.name: Luminous Sprite
entries: You glow with magical luminance. You naturally shed light as a torch; this light has the {@trait evocation}, {@trait light}, and {@trait primal} traits. You can extinguish, rekindle, or change the color of this light using a single action, which has the {@trait concentrate} trait.

heritage.name: Melixie
entries: You have the features of a bee, butterfly, or other insect that loves sweets. You can ask questions of and receive answers from arthropods (insects, spiders, scorpions, crabs, and similar invertebrate animals), as well as use {@skill Diplomacy} to {@action Make an Impression|CRB} on and {@action Request|CRB} things of them. Most bees, butterflies, moths, and beetles have an indifferent or friendly starting attitude toward you and give you time to make your case, though other arthropods react to you like any other adventurer.

heritage.name: Nyktera
entries: You have batlike features, an affinity for batkind, and hearing that is second to none. As long as you can hear normally, you can use the {@action Seek|CRB} action to sense {@condition undetected} creatures in a 60-foot cone instead of a 30-foot cone. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to locate {@condition undetected} creatures that you could hear within 30 feet with a {@action Seek|CRB} action.

heritage.name: Pixie
entries: You are larger than other sprites. Instead of Tiny, your size is Small.
